description: Base template type defining reusable UI component configurations. Templates specify the visual presentation and behavior of widgets, selectors, and other interactive components. Each template has a configuration schema that defines its customizable properties.

name.description: Display name of the template. Used in template selector and documentation.

description.description: Detailed description of what this template renders, its use cases, and configuration options.

config_schema_id.description: GTS identifier of the JSON Schema that defines this template's configuration structure. Specifies what properties are available for customization (e.g., colors, dimensions, behavior flags) and their validation rules.

category_id.description: GTS identifier of the category this template belongs to. Used to organize templates by type (charts, tables, maps, selectors) in the template library and UI.
